description: small spoon with eagle, globe, flowers and portrait of woman (Mrs. Potter Palmer) on front of handle; woman with parasol, shield, globe and flowers on back of handle; building in relief on bowl; "CHILDREN'S HOME CHICAGO 1893" below building
markings: on handle on top, in relief: [CHICAGO ILL.]; on handle on back, in relief: [STERLING / ALVIN / PAT. APP. FOR], [1492 (scroll) 1893] and [GOING TO THE WORLD\'S FAIR]
title: Children's Home Souvenir Spoon
